text: William Walter Barlow (February 20, 1931 â€“ July 5, 2020) was a Canadian politician and businessman. He was in the Legislative Assembly of Ontario from 1981 to 1987. He was a member of the Progressive Conservative Party. Barlow was born in Cambridge, Ontario. Barlow died at home in Cambridge on July 5, 2020 at the age of 89.Death of William Walter Barlow ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Ontario
